topic.title: Getting Started
topic.shortdesc: Information about installing, configuring, and using Oxygen XML WebHelp as a standalone product.

section.title: What is ?
section.p: is a standalone product that requires its own license key. It provides support for transforming DITA and DocBook resources into WebHelp output by running a transformation script outside of Oxygen XML Editor/Author. This is especially useful if you want to automate the output process.
